short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Always start your eBay search for items with your specified default filters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Update the default search parameters used when searching on eBay with this extension.  

The following defaults can be changed:

* Filter item location to local country or region only
* Free Shipping toggle

More to follow after feedback from users.
